document.full_text: citigroup inc  has hired jeff emmanuel from ubs ag  as managing director of its asia-pacific financial institutions group (fig), citigroup said in a statement on monday.
document.title: citi hires emmanuel from ubs as md for asia fig
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  has hired jeff emmanuel from ubs ag  as managing director of its asia-pacific financial institutions group (fig), citigroup said in a statement on monday.
